hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select localname as "nombre", costcenter as "codigo", CAST(Status as varchar) AS "estadoId" from AC_Costcentermst order by LOCALNAME
select costcenter as "codigo", localname as "nombre" from ac_costcentermst where 'C' = :p_tipo and status ='A' union select prime as "codigo", localname as "nombre" from primemst where 'P' = :p_tipo
select localname as "nombre", costcenter as "codigo", CAST(Status as varchar) AS "estadoId" from AC_Costcentermst where Status = 'A' order by LOCALNAME
select localname as "nombre", costcenter as "codigo" ,CAST(Status as varchar) AS "estadoId" from AC_Costcentermst where costcenter = :p_costcenter

select COSTCENTER "costcenter" ,LOCALNAME "localname" ,ENGLISHNAME "englishname" ,COSTCENTERCLASIFICATION "costcenterclasification" ,COSTCENTERGROUP "costcentergroup" ,COSTCENTERSUBGROUP "costcentersubgroup" ,COSTCENTERRELATION "costcenterrelation" ,RESPONSIBLE "responsible" ,CAST(EXPENSEFINANCEFLAG as varchar) "expensefinanceflag" ,CAST(EXPENSEADMINISTRATIVEFLAG as varchar) "expenseadministrativeflag" ,CAST(EXPENSESALESFLAG as varchar) "expensesalesflag" ,CAST(EXPENSEPRODUCTIONFLAG as varchar) "expenseproductionflag" ,COSTCENTERNEXT "costcenternext" ,VENDOR "vendor" ,AMOUNTINVOICES "amountinvoices" ,AMOUNTREQUISITIONS "amountrequisitions" ,AMOUNTADVANCES "amountadvances" ,AMOUNTOTHERS01 "amountothers01" ,AMOUNTOTHERS02 "amountothers02" ,AMOUNTOTHERS03 "amountothers03" ,VENDORSIGNFILE "vendorsignfile" ,ACCOUNT "account" ,CAST(STATUS as varchar) "status" ,LASTUSER "lastuser" ,LASTDATE "lastdate" ,CAST(INCOMEFLAG as varchar) "incomeflag" ,ACCOUNTINFLATION "accountinflation" ,CAST(EXPENSEFIXEDFLAG as varchar) "expensefixedflag" ,CAST(EXPENSEDIRECTFLAG as varchar) "expensedirectflag" ,SUCURSAL "sucursal" ,INTERNALNUMBER "internalnumber"
from AC_COSTCENTERMST where COSTCENTER = :p_costcenter

select COSTCENTER "costcenter" ,LOCALNAME "localname" ,ENGLISHNAME "englishname" ,COSTCENTERCLASIFICATION "costcenterclasification" ,COSTCENTERGROUP "costcentergroup" ,COSTCENTERSUBGROUP "costcentersubgroup" ,COSTCENTERRELATION "costcenterrelation" ,RESPONSIBLE "responsible" ,CAST(EXPENSEFINANCEFLAG as varchar) "expensefinanceflag" ,CAST(EXPENSEADMINISTRATIVEFLAG as varchar) "expenseadministrativeflag" ,CAST(EXPENSESALESFLAG as varchar) "expensesalesflag" ,CAST(EXPENSEPRODUCTIONFLAG as varchar) "expenseproductionflag" ,COSTCENTERNEXT "costcenternext" ,VENDOR "vendor" ,AMOUNTINVOICES "amountinvoices" ,AMOUNTREQUISITIONS "amountrequisitions" ,AMOUNTADVANCES "amountadvances" ,AMOUNTOTHERS01 "amountothers01" ,AMOUNTOTHERS02 "amountothers02" ,AMOUNTOTHERS03 "amountothers03" ,VENDORSIGNFILE "vendorsignfile" ,ACCOUNT "account" ,CAST(STATUS as varchar) "status" ,LASTUSER "lastuser" ,LASTDATE "lastdate" ,CAST(INCOMEFLAG as varchar) "incomeflag" ,ACCOUNTINFLATION "accountinflation" ,CAST(EXPENSEFIXEDFLAG as varchar) "expensefixedflag" ,CAST(EXPENSEDIRECTFLAG as varchar) "expensedirectflag" ,SUCURSAL "sucursal" ,INTERNALNUMBER "internalnumber"
from AC_COSTCENTERMST where COSTCENTER = ISNULL(:p_costcenter,COSTCENTER) and UPPER(ISNULL(LOCALNAME,'xxx')) like '%' + ISNULL(:p_localname,UPPER(LOCALNAME)) + '%' and ISNULL(status,'xx') = ISNULL(:p_status,ISNULL(status,'xx')) order by LOCALNAME

SELECT count(1) FROM seguridadautorizaciones A WHERE 1=1 AND A.APLICACIONCODIGO = :p_id_aplicacion AND A.GRUPO = :p_id_grupo AND A.CONCEPTO = :p_id_concepto AND A.ESTADO = 'A' AND A.USUARIO IN (SELECT :p_id_usuario UNION ALL SELECT P.PERFIL FROM SEGURIDADPERFILUSUARIO P WHERE P.USUARIO = :p_id_usuario AND P.ESTADO = 'A' )

SELECT count(1) FROM ac_costcentermst C INNER JOIN sy_seguridadautorizaciones A ON A.AplicacionCodigo = 'SY' AND A.Grupo = 'CENTROCOSTOS' AND A.Usuario = :p_id_usuario AND C.COSTCENTER = A.CONCEPTO WHERE 1=1 AND C.status = ISNULL(:p_id_estado,C.status) AND C.COSTCENTER LIKE '%' + ISNULL(:p_codigo,C.COSTCENTER) + '%' AND UPPER(C.LOCALNAME) LIKE '%' + UPPER(ISNULL(:p_nombre,C.LOCALNAME)) + '%' AND ( C.multicompanyflag = 'S' OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ac_costcentercompany WHERE C.costcenter = ac_costcentercompany.costcenter AND ac_costcentercompany.companyowner = :p_id_compania) )

SELECT C.COSTCENTER as "costcenter" ,C.LOCALNAME as "localname" ,CAST(C.expensefinanceflag as varchar) as "expensefinanceflag" ,CAST(C.expenseadministrativeflag as varchar) as "expenseadministrativeflag" ,CAST(C.expensesalesflag as varchar) as "expensesalesflag" ,CAST(C.expenseproductionflag as varchar) as "expenseproductionflag" FROM ac_costcentermst C INNER JOIN sy_seguridadautorizaciones A ON A.AplicacionCodigo = 'SY' AND A.Grupo = 'CENTROCOSTOS' AND A.Usuario = :p_id_usuario AND C.COSTCENTER = A.CONCEPTO WHERE 1=1 AND C.status = ISNULL(:p_id_estado,C.status) AND C.COSTCENTER LIKE '%' + ISNULL(:p_codigo,C.COSTCENTER) + '%' AND UPPER(C.LOCALNAME) LIKE '%' + UPPER(ISNULL(:p_nombre,C.LOCALNAME)) + '%' AND ( C.multicompanyflag = 'S' OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ac_costcentercompany WHERE C.costcenter = ac_costcentercompany.costcenter AND ac_costcentercompany.companyowner = :p_id_compania) ) order by C.COSTCENTER

SELECT C.COSTCENTER as "costcenter" ,C.LOCALNAME as "localname" ,CAST(C.expensefinanceflag as varchar) as "expensefinanceflag" ,CAST(C.expenseadministrativeflag as varchar) as "expenseadministrativeflag" ,CAST(C.expensesalesflag as varchar) as "expensesalesflag" ,CAST(C.expenseproductionflag as varchar) as "expenseproductionflag" FROM ac_costcentermst C WHERE C.COSTCENTER = ISNULL(:p_codigo,C.COSTCENTER) AND C.status = ISNULL(:p_id_estado,C.status) AND C.LOCALNAME LIKE '%' + ISNULL(:p_nombre,C.LOCALNAME) + '%' AND ( C.multicompanyflag = 'S' OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ac_costcentercompany WHERE C.costcenter = ac_costcentercompany.costcenter AND ac_costcentercompany.companyowner = :p_id_compania) ) AND ( C.VENDOR = :p_id_persona OR 'S' = :p_flg_supervisor ) order by C.COSTCENTER

SELECT count(1) FROM ac_costcentermst C WHERE C.COSTCENTER = ISNULL(:p_codigo,C.COSTCENTER) AND C.status = ISNULL(:p_id_estado,C.status) AND C.LOCALNAME LIKE '%' + ISNULL(:p_nombre,C.LOCALNAME) + '%' AND ( C.multicompanyflag = 'S' OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ac_costcentercompany WHERE C.costcenter = ac_costcentercompany.costcenter AND ac_costcentercompany.companyowner = :p_id_compania) ) AND ( C.VENDOR = :p_id_persona OR 'S' = :p_flg_supervisor )

SELECT C.COSTCENTER as "costcenter" ,C.LOCALNAME as "localname" ,CAST(C.expensefinanceflag as varchar) as "expensefinanceflag" ,CAST(C.expenseadministrativeflag as varchar) as "expenseadministrativeflag" ,CAST(C.expensesalesflag as varchar) as "expensesalesflag" ,CAST(C.expenseproductionflag as varchar) as "expenseproductionflag" FROM ac_costcentermst C inner join MA_PersonaCentroCostoAutorizac A on C.COSTCENTER = A.CENTROCOSTOS WHERE C.COSTCENTER = ISNULL(:p_codigo,C.COSTCENTER) AND C.status = ISNULL(:p_id_estado,C.status) AND C.LOCALNAME LIKE '%' + ISNULL(:p_nombre,C.LOCALNAME) + '%' AND ( C.multicompanyflag = 'S' OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ac_costcentercompany WHERE C.costcenter = ac_costcentercompany.costcenter AND ac_costcentercompany.companyowner = :p_id_compania) ) AND A.APLICACIONCODIGO = 'WH' AND A.PERSONA = :p_id_persona AND ISNULL(A.REVISIONFLAG,'X') = ISNULL(:p_flg_revision, ISNULL(A.REVISIONFLAG,'X')) AND ISNULL(A.APROBACIONFLAG,'X') = ISNULL(:p_flg_aprobacion, ISNULL(A.APROBACIONFLAG,'X')) AND ISNULL(A.PREPARACIONFLAG,'X') = ISNULL(:p_flg_preparacion, ISNULL(A.PREPARACIONFLAG,'X'))
order by C.COSTCENTER

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ac_costcentermst C inner join MA_PersonaCentroCostoAutorizac A on C.COSTCENTER = A.CENTROCOSTOS WHERE C.COSTCENTER = ISNULL(:p_codigo,C.COSTCENTER) AND C.LOCALNAME LIKE '%' + ISNULL(:p_nombre,C.LOCALNAME) + '%' AND ( C.multicompanyflag = 'S' OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ac_costcentercompany WHERE C.costcenter = ac_costcentercompany.costcenter AND ac_costcentercompany.companyowner = :p_id_compania) ) AND A.APLICACIONCODIGO = 'WH' AND C.status = ISNULL(:p_id_estado,C.status) AND A.PERSONA = :p_id_persona AND ISNULL(A.REVISIONFLAG,'X') = ISNULL(:p_flg_revision, ISNULL(A.REVISIONFLAG,'X')) AND ISNULL(A.APROBACIONFLAG,'X') = ISNULL(:p_flg_aprobacion, ISNULL(A.APROBACIONFLAG,'X')) AND ISNULL(A.PREPARACIONFLAG,'X') = ISNULL(:p_flg_preparacion, ISNULL(A.PREPARACIONFLAG,'X'))

SELECT count(1) FROM ac_costcentermst C INNER JOIN sy_seguridadautorizaciones A ON A.AplicacionCodigo = 'SY' AND A.Grupo = 'CENTROCOSTOS' AND A.Usuario = :p_id_usuario AND C.COSTCENTER = A.CONCEPTO WHERE 1=1 AND C.status = ISNULL(:p_id_estado,C.status) AND C.COSTCENTER LIKE '%' + ISNULL(:p_codigo,C.COSTCENTER) + '%' AND UPPER(C.LOCALNAME) LIKE '%' + UPPER(ISNULL(:p_nombre,C.LOCALNAME)) + '%' AND LEN(RTRIM(LTRIM(C.COSTCENTER))) = 3 AND ( C.multicompanyflag = 'S' OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ac_costcentercompany WHERE C.costcenter = ac_costcentercompany.costcenter AND ac_costcentercompany.companyowner = :p_id_compania) )

SELECT C.COSTCENTER as "costcenter" ,C.LOCALNAME as "localname" ,CAST(C.expensefinanceflag as varchar) as "expensefinanceflag" ,CAST(C.expenseadministrativeflag as varchar) as "expenseadministrativeflag" ,CAST(C.expensesalesflag as varchar) as "expensesalesflag" ,CAST(C.expenseproductionflag as varchar) as "expenseproductionflag" FROM ac_costcentermst C INNER JOIN sy_seguridadautorizaciones A ON A.AplicacionCodigo = 'SY' AND A.Grupo = 'CENTROCOSTOS' AND A.Usuario = :p_id_usuario AND C.COSTCENTER = A.CONCEPTO WHERE 1=1 AND C.status = ISNULL(:p_id_estado,C.status) AND C.COSTCENTER LIKE '%' + ISNULL(:p_codigo,C.COSTCENTER) + '%' AND UPPER(C.LOCALNAME) LIKE '%' + UPPER(ISNULL(:p_nombre,C.LOCALNAME)) + '%' AND LEN(RTRIM(LTRIM(C.COSTCENTER))) = 3 AND ( C.multicompanyflag = 'S' OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ac_costcentercompany WHERE C.costcenter = ac_costcentercompany.costcenter AND ac_costcentercompany.companyowner = :p_id_compania) ) order by C.COSTCENTER

SELECT count(1) FROM ac_costcentermst C WHERE C.COSTCENTER = ISNULL(:p_codigo,C.COSTCENTER) AND C.status = ISNULL(:p_id_estado,C.status) AND C.LOCALNAME LIKE '%' + ISNULL(:p_nombre,C.LOCALNAME) + '%' AND LEN(RTRIM(LTRIM(C.COSTCENTER))) = 3 AND ( C.multicompanyflag = 'S' OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ac_costcentercompany WHERE C.costcenter = ac_costcentercompany.costcenter AND ac_costcentercompany.companyowner = :p_id_compania) ) AND ( C.VENDOR = :p_id_persona OR 'S' = :p_flg_supervisor )

SELECT C.COSTCENTER as "costcenter" ,C.LOCALNAME as "localname" ,CAST(C.expensefinanceflag as varchar) as "expensefinanceflag" ,CAST(C.expenseadministrativeflag as varchar) as "expenseadministrativeflag" ,CAST(C.expensesalesflag as varchar) as "expensesalesflag" ,CAST(C.expenseproductionflag as varchar) as "expenseproductionflag" FROM ac_costcentermst C WHERE C.COSTCENTER = ISNULL(:p_codigo,C.COSTCENTER) AND C.status = ISNULL(:p_id_estado,C.status) AND C.LOCALNAME LIKE '%' + ISNULL(:p_nombre,C.LOCALNAME) + '%' AND LEN(RTRIM(LTRIM(C.COSTCENTER))) = 3 AND ( C.multicompanyflag = 'S' OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ac_costcentercompany WHERE C.costcenter = ac_costcentercompany.costcenter AND ac_costcentercompany.companyowner = :p_id_compania) ) AND ( C.VENDOR = :p_id_persona OR 'S' = :p_flg_supervisor ) order by C.COSTCENTER

SELECT count(1) FROM ac_costcentermst C INNER JOIN sy_seguridadautorizaciones A ON A.AplicacionCodigo = 'SY' AND A.Grupo = 'CENTROCOSTOS' AND A.Usuario = :p_id_usuario AND C.COSTCENTER = A.CONCEPTO WHERE 1=1 AND C.status = ISNULL(:p_id_estado,C.status) AND C.COSTCENTER LIKE '%' + ISNULL(:p_codigo,C.COSTCENTER) + '%' AND UPPER(C.LOCALNAME) LIKE '%' + UPPER(ISNULL(:p_nombre,C.LOCALNAME)) + '%' AND LEN(RTRIM(LTRIM(C.COSTCENTER))) = 5 AND ( C.multicompanyflag = 'S' OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ac_costcentercompany WHERE C.costcenter = ac_costcentercompany.costcenter AND ac_costcentercompany.companyowner = :p_id_compania) )

SELECT C.COSTCENTER as "costcenter" ,C.LOCALNAME as "localname" ,CAST(C.expensefinanceflag as varchar) as "expensefinanceflag" ,CAST(C.expenseadministrativeflag as varchar) as "expenseadministrativeflag" ,CAST(C.expensesalesflag as varchar) as "expensesalesflag" ,CAST(C.expenseproductionflag as varchar) as "expenseproductionflag" FROM ac_costcentermst C INNER JOIN sy_seguridadautorizaciones A ON A.AplicacionCodigo = 'SY' AND A.Grupo = 'CENTROCOSTOS' AND A.Usuario = :p_id_usuario AND C.COSTCENTER = A.CONCEPTO WHERE 1=1 AND C.status = ISNULL(:p_id_estado,C.status) AND C.COSTCENTER LIKE '%' + ISNULL(:p_codigo,C.COSTCENTER) + '%' AND UPPER(C.LOCALNAME) LIKE '%' + UPPER(ISNULL(:p_nombre,C.LOCALNAME)) + '%' AND LEN(RTRIM(LTRIM(C.COSTCENTER))) = 5 AND ( C.multicompanyflag = 'S' OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ac_costcentercompany WHERE C.costcenter = ac_costcentercompany.costcenter AND ac_costcentercompany.companyowner = :p_id_compania) ) order by C.COSTCENTER

SELECT count(1) FROM ac_costcentermst C WHERE C.COSTCENTER = ISNULL(:p_codigo,C.COSTCENTER) AND C.status = ISNULL(:p_id_estado,C.status) AND C.LOCALNAME LIKE '%' + ISNULL(:p_nombre,C.LOCALNAME) + '%' AND LEN(RTRIM(LTRIM(C.COSTCENTER))) = 5 AND ( C.multicompanyflag = 'S' OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ac_costcentercompany WHERE C.costcenter = ac_costcentercompany.costcenter AND ac_costcentercompany.companyowner = :p_id_compania) ) AND ( C.VENDOR = :p_id_persona OR 'S' = :p_flg_supervisor )

SELECT C.COSTCENTER as "costcenter" ,C.LOCALNAME as "localname" ,CAST(C.expensefinanceflag as varchar) as "expensefinanceflag" ,CAST(C.expenseadministrativeflag as varchar) as "expenseadministrativeflag" ,CAST(C.expensesalesflag as varchar) as "expensesalesflag" ,CAST(C.expenseproductionflag as varchar) as "expenseproductionflag" FROM ac_costcentermst C WHERE C.COSTCENTER = ISNULL(:p_codigo,C.COSTCENTER) AND C.status = ISNULL(:p_id_estado,C.status) AND C.LOCALNAME LIKE '%' + ISNULL(:p_nombre,C.LOCALNAME) + '%' AND LEN(RTRIM(LTRIM(C.COSTCENTER))) = 5 AND ( C.multicompanyflag = 'S' OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ac_costcentercompany WHERE C.costcenter = ac_costcentercompany.costcenter AND ac_costcentercompany.companyowner = :p_id_compania) ) AND ( C.VENDOR = :p_id_persona OR 'S' = :p_flg_supervisor ) order by C.COSTCENTER
SELECT count(*) FROM ac_costcentermst C WHERE C.COSTCENTER = ISNULL(:p_codigo,C.COSTCENTER) AND C.status = ISNULL(:p_id_estado,C.status) AND C.LOCALNAME LIKE '%' + ISNULL(:p_nombre,C.LOCALNAME) + '%'

SELECT C.COSTCENTER as "costcenter" ,C.LOCALNAME as "localname" ,CAST(C.expensefinanceflag as varchar) as "expensefinanceflag" ,CAST(C.expenseadministrativeflag as varchar) as "expenseadministrativeflag" ,CAST(C.expensesalesflag as varchar) as "expensesalesflag" ,CAST(C.expenseproductionflag as varchar) as "expenseproductionflag" FROM ac_costcentermst C WHERE C.COSTCENTER = ISNULL(:p_codigo,C.COSTCENTER) AND C.status = ISNULL(:p_id_estado,C.status) AND C.LOCALNAME LIKE '%' + ISNULL(:p_nombre,C.LOCALNAME) + '%'
order by C.COSTCENTER
